sections.heading: 860 through 867 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Community Residential Living for Persons with Developmental or Physical Disabilities Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1987, c. 169, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1987. Amended by Laws 1996, c. 354, ยง 41, eff. Nov. 1, 1996.
